title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.39 - Additions to regular security officer lists
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5.39 - Additions to regular security officer lists

State Regulations

Additions to regular security officer lists shall be
selected in the following order from: (a) qualified individuals on the employers'
extra security officers list; or
(b) from available qualified individuals on the basis of seniority in the
industry. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5.39

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
